title: Romantic Winter Escape on the Striking Coast of New Zealand’s North Island
description: Brimming with isolated bays, rugged coastal trails and natural rainforest, the Coromandel Peninsula is a common go-to holiday destination for North Island Kiwi’s. Set amid a striking mountainous backdrop perched just 200 metres from the white-sand shore, 970 Lonely Bay Lodge boasts a secluded escape in one of the world’s most striking landscapes. Includes daily a la carte breakfast, cheese platter on arrival, complimentary in-room minibar and late checkout.
